item.title: TikTok probably will get a 90-day reprieve on ban, Trump says
item.description: The president-elect told NBC News that extending the deadline before TikTok is banned in the United States would be “appropriate.”

item.title: Officials announce updated road and Metro closures for inauguration
item.description: Details still remain murky for how attendees can watch the main events at Capital One Arena.

item.title: Indoor inauguration upends plans for Trump backers. They’re still excited.
item.description: Many Trump supporters have yet to figure out backup plans for Inauguration Day.
